images.description: A DSS image of the region near the NGC position for the almost certainly lost or nonextistent NGC 1396
Observatorio Antilhue image of region near lenticular galaxy PGC 13398 (which is often misidentified as NGC 1396), also showing elliptical galaxy NGC 1399
ESO image of lenticular galaxy PGC 13398, which is often misidentified as NGC 1396
NOIRlab image of elliptical galaxy PGC 13398, which is often misidentified as NGC 1396
